headline.print_headline: Mexico: Guards Accused in Prison Riot
headline.main: Mexico: Guards Accused in Prison Riot

headline.print_headline: Italy: Fuel Removed From Cruise Ship
headline.main: Italy: Fuel Removed From Cruise Ship

docs.snippet: Salvage experts have emptied the tanks containing most of the fuel aboard the Costa Concordia cruise ship, which capsized on Jan. 13....
docs.abstract: Salvage experts have emptied the tanks containing most of the fuel aboard the Costa Concordia cruise ship, which capsized in January, completing the first step needed to avert an environmental disaster off Italy's coast.
docs.lead_paragraph: Salvage experts have emptied the tanks containing most of the fuel aboard the Costa Concordia cruise ship, which capsized on Jan. 13.
